Name: Knight Solitaire 2
About the game: The time has come to go on incredible new adventures in a new Knight Solitaire! You've already proven that the champion's title can belong only to a true knight, with a burning brave heart and a cold, calculating mind! Now the time has come to fight a true enemy. Will you be able to defeat the great dragon who protects all the gold of the ancient kingdom? 12 luxurious locations and entertaining gameplay. Make chains of cards, use bonuses, do different combos and get real royal rewsrds! For daring players, we offer special achievements and trophies. You can select your game mode to tailor the gameâ€™s difficulty to suit you, so new players and solitaire masters alike will find themselves entertained. 120 levels accompanied by relaxing royal medieval music. Defeat the dragon and claim all the gold of the kingdom! - an entertaining solitaire for new players and experts alike! - make chains of cards, use bonuses, and get bonus rewards - 12 locations, 120 levels and several difficulty modes - for daring players, we offer special achievements and trophies - a medieval kingdom setting and high-quality graphics - original themed decks and card backs - beautiful music that doesn't distract from gameplay
